languages.text: [Расхохотаться] "Прости, но это ужасно трогательно — арбитр, играющий мне на органе!"

traits.locale_text: о боже мой это пиздец смешно

languages.text: [Burst out laughing] "I'm sorry, but this is terribly poignant — an Arbitrator playing the organ for me!"
languages.original_text: [Расхохотаться] "Прости, но это ужасно трогательно — арбитр, играющий мне на органе!"

languages.text: [思わず吹き出す]「すまない。でもあまりに感動的で─アービトレイターが{mf|俺|私}のためにオルガンを弾いてくれるなんて！」
languages.original_text: [Burst out laughing] "I'm sorry, but this is terribly poignant — an Arbitrator playing the organ for me!"

traits.locale_text: [思わず吹き出す]「すまない。でもあまりに感動的で─アービトレイターが{mf|俺|私}のためにオルガンを弾いてくれるなんて！」

languages.text: [Laut loslachen] "Verzeiht, aber das ist wirklich ergreifend – ein Arbitrator spielt für mich Orgel!"
languages.original_text: [Burst out laughing] "I'm sorry, but this is terribly poignant — an Arbitrator playing the organ for me!"

traits.locale_text: [Laut loslachen] "Verzeiht, aber das ist wirklich ergreifend – ein Arbitrator spielt für mich Orgel!"

languages.text: [Éclater de rire] « Excusez-moi, mais un arbitrator qui me joue de l'orgue... Avouez que la situation prête à rire ! »
languages.original_text: [Burst out laughing] "I'm sorry, but this is terribly poignant — an Arbitrator playing the organ for me!"

traits.locale_text: [Éclater de rire] « Excusez-moi, mais un arbitrator qui me joue de l'orgue... Avouez que la situation prête à rire ! »

languages.text: [Romper a reír] «Me lo cuentan y no me lo creo: ¡un Arbitrator está tocando el órgano para mi deleite!».
languages.original_text: [Burst out laughing] "I'm sorry, but this is terribly poignant — an Arbitrator playing the organ for me!"

traits.locale_text: [Romper a reír] «Me lo cuentan y no me lo creo: ¡un Arbitrator está tocando el órgano para mi deleite!».

languages.text: [放声大笑]“不好意思，但这实在是太让人绷不住了——堂堂法务官，居然在为我演奏管风琴！”
languages.original_text: [Burst out laughing] "I'm sorry, but this is terribly poignant — an Arbitrator playing the organ for me!"

traits.locale_text: [放声大笑]“不好意思，但这实在是太让人绷不住了——堂堂法务官，居然在为我演奏管风琴！”

languages.text: [Kahkahaya boğulur] "Affedersin ama bir Yargıcı'nın bana org çalması çok hazin!"
languages.original_text: [Burst out laughing] "I'm sorry, but this is terribly poignant — an Arbitrator playing the organ for me!"

traits.locale_text: [Kahkahaya boğulur] "Affedersin ama bir Yargıcı'nın bana org çalması pek hazin!"
